head.title: Ikea Sues Mamaroneck Over Right of Review

hedline.hl1: Ikea Sues Mamaroneck Over Right of Review

abstract.p: Ikea, which wants to build furniture store in New Rochelle, NY, files suit against Mamaroneck seeking to invalidate law that Town Board claims gives it right to review major projects on its borders (S)

block.p: Ikea, which wants to build a furniture store in New Rochelle, has filed suit against the town of Mamaroneck, seeking to invalidate a law passed in April that the Town Board claims gives it the right to review major projects on its borders. The city of New Rochelle has already challenged the constitutionality of Mamaroneck's law.

Ikea, which wants to build a furniture store in New Rochelle, has filed suit against the town of Mamaroneck, seeking to invalidate a law passed in April that the Town Board claims gives it the right to review major projects on its borders. The city of New Rochelle has already challenged the constitutionality of Mamaroneck's law.

''It surprises me that Ikea would not be willing to voluntarily come forward and discuss the impacts of its development,'' Robert A. Spolzino, a lawyer for Mamaroneck, said of the suit. But lawyers for Ikea said a state environmental-quality-review act is under consideration and would apply not only to New Rochelle but other communities. Mamaroneck will answer the suit by early September, Mr. Spolzino said.
